name: SPLITbot
description:
This little thing was made  for Trijam #something(i forgor) in around 2 hours 30 minutes, solo. You play as a professor who is testing his new invention, the SplitBot™, which uses one remote to control many different bots at once. Deem this invention a success by making every bot stand on the buttons at the same time to advance to the next test! There are 4 levels, the first 3 of which are definitely possible. Can you beat level 4? 

WASD to move. Also play in fullscreen to see the whole thing.
